name: Echinacea Clove Soap with fair trade shea butter
description:
Dreamseeds is the venue for showing the creations of herbalist Kristena Roder. This may come as a bar of soap, a beeswax mobile, a basket, or some handmade creation outside of these descriptions.
We love working with the seasons, plants, and the oils, flowers, foliage they provide.
Our goal is to be a sustainable company and make a positive difference in this work. Besides, we make some kick ass stuff you will enjoy.

	This echinacea clove soap is made with infusion of the plant that grows on our land saponified with olive and veggie oils, coconut, palm, kukui nut oil, rice bran oil, castor, shea butter and clove essential oil appx 5 oz each

name: Wise Woman Cloak
description:
Handmade for Dreamseeds by Cindy of Dancing Bears.
This cloak represents the love of our plant works and the power there in.
Fleece fiber from recycled soda bottles.
The button designed with a thistle

name: Love Tonic Tea
description:
This is an organic blend I created to enhance libido. The actions of the herbs cause blood flow to circulate thorughout the pelvic region providing more oxygen adn stimulation. This is also goof for soothing the nerves, and may increase fertility.
I did not relaize the power of this herb and I conceived while studying the plant and drinking this tea blend so I know its actions are true.

name: Blue Chamomile Shea Cream
description:
This is such a faithful cream! Made with unrefined shea butter and infused herbal oils right here in our studio.
Combined with the gentle action of blue chamomile shea cream and a drop of roman chamomile and french lavender
Great for eczema, psoriasis, rash, hot skin, sunburn, diaper rash, make up removal. It also calms down puffy eyelids. 2 oz

name: Chocolate Rose Shea Cream with Organic Calendula Oatmeal Soap
description:
Delightful bitter chocolate is whipped with unrefined Fair Trade shea butter and our handmade blend of herbal infused oils. Rose Otto essential oil is blended in for its beautiful aroma and calming nature for the skin.
4 oz cream and 4 oz soap set

	We donate $1 from each bar of organic calendula oatmeal soap we sell to United Plant Savers to support their work in creating awareness and existance of endangered herbs in the Western world.
